society_info.summary: Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society, established in 1998 and registered in New Delhi, operates educational institutions under the "Galgotias" name in Greater Noida, UP. With over three decades of experience, the society manages four institutions: Galgotias Institute of Management & Technology (GIMT), Galgotias College of Engineering & Technology (GCET), Galgotia College of Pharmacy (GCP), and Galgotias University (GU). The society emphasizes experienced faculty, modern infrastructure, and a commitment to quality, resulting in well-prepared graduates sought after by multinational companies and earning respect from the corporate world.
society_info.raw_content:
Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society
Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society was established in the year 1998 and registered under the Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 with its registered address at Daryaganj, New Delhi. The Society runs institutions with the name of “Galgotias'' in Greater Noida, UP. The members of the society are Mr. Suneel Galgotia, Mrs. Padmini Galgotia and Mr. Dhruv Galgotia.
Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society has an experience of over three decades in the education sector. The society, at present, runs three colleges viz. Galgotias Institute of Management & Technology (GIMT) and Galgotias College of Engineering & Technology (GCET) and Galgotia College of Pharmacy (GCP), and one university in the name of Galgotias University (GU) at Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. Thus, the society has an established track record of over two decades in running educational institutions.
The society has the privilege of having a number of experienced faculty members, which is essential in building a strong brand name and attracting quality students. Further, all the institutes under the society have modern infrastructure, and latest tools & technologies.
The result of decades of excellence in higher education has propelled the Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society’s institutions to emerge as the preferred home for high achieving students seeking world class higher education. Graduates are technically well prepared, are critical thinkers and can communicate effectively. The quality of our graduates is acknowledged by renowned multinational companies that recruit our students as competition among them to attract our top graduates is intense.
The unwavering commitment of Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society for quality in all aspects of education including infrastructure, academics and administration has won respect from the corporate world as well. With a focus on research that drives innovation, it is emerging as the leading center for knowledge generation and dissemination. Smt. Shakuntala Educational and Welfare Society endeavor to continuously explore new opportunities by innovating to create new epicenters of growth.
